DOC.brief_summary: Hemoptysis is one of the serious complication of many pulmonary diseases. Upto now, there is no proven medical treatment in recurrence of hemoptysis. The investigators will conduct a randomized, placebo controlled trial of tranexamic acid, which can reduce the recurrence of hemoptysis.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Tranexamic Acid on Prevention of Recurrence of Hemoptysis
DOC.criteria: age: >=20 and <=75 ER visit or admission for hemoptysis no evidence of hemoptysis on screening anticoagulation treatment Cr >= 2.0 mg/dL or urinary protein >= 2+ or who received renal replacement treatment hepatic failure: total bilirubin >= 1.5 mg/dL or AST or ALT >= 1.5 of upper normal limit level hypersensitivity to tranexamic acid pregnant woman fertile female who don't use contraception
